remarks: Lemma for ~ elqaa .  The function ` N ` represents the denominators of the rational coefficients ` B ` .  By multiplying them all together to make ` R ` , we get a number big enough to clear all the denominators and make ` R x. F ` an integer polynomial.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Jul-2014.)

elqaa.6 $e |- R = ( seq 0 ( x. , N ) ` ( deg ` F ) ) $.
